Variables
virtualCameras
private static List<AICEVirtualCamera> virtualCameras

The List{T} of every AICEVirtualCameras registered.

onVirtualCameraRegistered
private static Action<AICEVirtualCamera, EICEVirtualCameraTargetUsage> onVirtualCameraRegistered

Invoked when a AICEVirtualCamera has been registered.

Parameters
Arg 01

The AICEVirtualCamera that have been registered.

Arg 02

The EICEVirtualCameraTargetUsage of this AICEVirtualCamera.

onVirtualCameraUnregistered

Invoked when a AICEVirtualCamera has been unregistered.

Parameters
Arg 01

The AICEVirtualCamera that have been unregistered.

Arg 02

The EICEVirtualCameraTargetUsage of this AICEVirtualCamera.
